title: The Hunt
overview: Tina Krause is an 18th Century huntress who’s after some very dangerous game. She thinks she’s in control, but learns how wrong she really is! The hunter becomes the hunted! Tina starts out dressed in a very proper skirt, jacket, hat, and blouse only to find herself struggling for survival dressed only blood splattered and shredded undergarments. This is a supernatural thriller not to be missed!
